price: 105. Qhiyaamah ayró tamaate saaku hebeltô nafsi mayaaba isi Rabbih idnih yaaba kaa akke waytek, tokkel keenit uma numuy koroositey digaalá cakkisita yaniih, meqe numuy isi Rabbil yeemeney usuk niqmat kah yecee keenit yanih.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِ لَا تَكَلَّمُ نَفۡسٌ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦۚ فَمِنۡهُمۡ شَقِيّٞ وَسَعِيدٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma yati lā takallamu nafsun illā bi-idh'nihi famin'hum shaqiyyun wasaʿīdun
